items.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent calls for a review of 'the entire' Federal Reserve
items.description: Bessent suggested for a review that would go beyond the current controversy over building renovations.

items.title: Brexit made businesses abandon the UK. Trump's hefty EU tariffs could bring them back
items.description: President Trump's threatened 30% tariffs on the EU might prompt some businesses to take another look at the U.K.

items.title: ‘30% is untenable’: From Irish whiskey to Italian cheese, Trump's tariff threat rattles EU exporters
items.description: "At that 30% level ... it will be a lose-lose situation," one distillery boss told CNBC.

items.title: Israel's stock market outperforms Middle East counterparts despite multi-front wars
items.description: Israel's markets have been lifted by significant foreign investment and more recently by renewed investor confidence following its 12-day conflict wit...

items.title: Inflation outlook tumbles to pre-tariff levels in latest University of Michigan survey
items.description: Consumers' worst fears about tariff-induced inflation have receded, though they are still wary of price increases to come.
